document_data.name: Company of the Bloody Banner
document_data.mainbody: The '''Company of the Bloody Bandy''' was an [[adventuring company]] that was active in [[Waterdeep]] around [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Organization: The membership of the Bloody Banner was almost entirely composed of female [[half-elves]] whose [[alignment]]s leaned towards [[evil]].
document_data.Relationships: The Bloody Banner was counted among the local Waterdhavian contacts of [[Feldyn]], the owner of the [[Old Monster Shop]].
